mapper.update: UPDATE student SET grade = null, score = null WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_number = #{userNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT class_id FROM student WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_number = #{number})

SELECT school.name,student.province,user.username,user.user_number,user.sex,student.score ,wish.wish.first_name,wish.wish.second_name,wish.wish.third_name FROM student INNER JOIN wish on student.user_id = wish.user_id INNER JOIN wish.school ON student.school_id = school.school_id INNER JOIN wish.user on user.user_id = student.user_id WHERE student.user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM student WHERE class_id = #{classId}) and wish.wish.time_id = #{timeId} LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{current};
SELECT user_id FROM student WHERE class_id = #{classId}

SELECT class.class_name,subject_group.subjects,school.name,student.province,user.username,user.user_number,user.sex,student.score ,wish.wish.first_name,wish.wish.second_name,wish.wish.third_name,mate.major_id,mate.major_name,mate.mate_way,user.phone,student.parent_phone FROM student INNER JOIN wish on student.user_id = wish.user_id INNER JOIN wish.school ON student.school_id = school.school_id INNER JOIN wish.user on user.user_id = student.user_id INNER JOIN wish.subject_group on wish.subject_group.hashcode = student.hashcode INNER JOIN wish.mate on wish.mate.user_id = student.user_id INNER JOIN wish.class on class.class_id = student.class_id WHERE student.user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM student WHERE school_id = #{schoolId}) and wish.wish.time_id = #{timeId} and mate.mate_way = #{mateWay} and mate.major_id is not null;
